directions: In a medium bowl combine 2 cups milk and pudding mixture; stir well until thickened.
To the pudding add remaining 2 cups milk and egg substitute; mix well.  Stir in vanilla extract, salt and nutmeg until well blended and coats a spoon.
ingredients: 1 (1 ounce) package instant sugar-free vanilla pudding mix
title: Eggnog II
